TopicTitle: The new KAS and what you can do with containers

Articles.Content:
I am very impressed by the latest KAS and its new containers feature

I used KAS in the past (version 0.3xx) in my .21 sandbox save and loved it. I had no idea of the new features until I installed it to my .22 which until then was stock only. My previous uses of the mod were merely to winch down rovers from landers and also link my crafts/modules in my Duna base (ended up in a huge explosion when the winches retracted one day).

Now I have been looking at what could be done with those containers in my new career mode. I have pretty much unlocked 90% of the tech tree by now and starting to just play around instead of science hunting (although I will still continue on a slower and more realistic pace). Not going to make bases as of yet but plenty of apollo style missions all over the kerbol system.

So my 2 current ideas are:

- assembling a small rover from parts stored in containers after landing

- assembling a small science station on the ground instead of having everything on the lander itself

Still gotta go in the config files to add the parts I want to be grabbable but I have set new goals to myself and cant wait to start designing.

So to all of you who are using this mod, what have you come with? please show pictures!

While this isn't exactly with containers, it is done with the ability to pick things up.
